text:
Despite seeing some bad reviews, wife and I decided to give em a try . Food was good as you can see from our clean plates üòÇ
The "malay lady" that many said was rude - she was friendly to us ü§≠
Definitely will come here again üëçüèª

Just went to have lunch just now, I wanted to see the menu but my hand was full and the menu was under an order. The staff saw i was struggling but did not help at all, she kept using her phone. After making payment she completely forgot my order and made me wait 15minutes before noticing. Not a single sorry was said and she went back to using her phone. Extremely poor attitude
Suggest shop to use thicker & better paper bag for the popcorn chicken (delivery order). It's soaked with oil and torn easily.

We don't care what negative reviews was given but the food is really really good..we never usually finished our food but this time we empty our plates!..

Good food guys, please don't close down..and the portion given was good as well!..

I ordered $12 spring chicken for take away on 8 Oct. They gave me 2 pieces of half spring chicken. Chicken was overcooked/refried. Size was extremely small. Meat was dry. Horrible. The worst chicken I had in my entire life. I rather buy NTUC roasted chicken. Fushion Western, please don't cheat your customers. Karma will hit back at you.
